Key.Original: Kill the Officer
A %1 officer is inspecting %2. Go there and kill him before %3.
SpecOps
We have spotted a %1 SpecOp team patrolling around a %2. Ambush them and we will have one less problem. Do this before %3. Be careful, they are tough boys.
Resource Acquisition
A %1 would be a fine addition to our cause. Go there and capture it before %2.
Take the Outpost
A %1 is disturbing our operations in the area. Go there and capture it before %2.
Secure the Seaport
%1 is an important fishing supplier for our local Fish&Chips dinners. Go there and capture it before %2.
Reclaim means of production
%1 is being used to aid the enemy. Go there and capture it before %2.
Battle for %1

This is our chance to turn %1 to our side. An uprising has been prepared, and the enemy have sent a suppression force. Talk to the local leader for the uprising at the task marker or attack the enemy forces before %2 to start the battle.
Trigger the uprising
We have lost our opportunity. We will need to rebuild support in %1 before we have another chance to take it.
The uprising in %1 has begun! Help them destroy the oppressors before %2 and the city will be ours.
The battle for %1 has started!
Glorious victory in %1! The oppressors will not dare to return after this humiliation.
The uprising has been defeated. We will need to rebuild support in %1 before we have another chance to take it.
City Supplies

%1 population is in need of supplies. We may improve our relationship with that city if we are the ones who provide them. I have placed a crate with supplies near our HQ. Deliver the crate to %1 city center, hold it there for %3 minutes and it's done. Do this before %2.
Distribution paused. We need friendly units close to the shipment and no enemies.
Keep distributing supplies for %1 more seconds.
Supplies Delivered.
Supplies Delivered. There's no sign of enemies nearby so we can leave the locals to unload.
Supply delivery failed.
Rescue hostage
A rebel commander's cousin is being held hostage in %1. Reach them before %2 and extract them to rebel territory.
I'm glad you're here. Take me to any rebel location and I'll figure it out from there.
We've recovered the hostage. Take them to any rebel location by %1.
Are you even trying to get anywhere? I'll find my own way out.
Deal with corrupt cop
A corrupt cop in %1 has been harassing civilians even more than usual. We've figured out some of his routine. Deal with him before %2.
Good riddance. He won't be bothering anyone again.
"Looks like you've convinced the scumbag of the error of his ways. We'll find a good use for his talents.
We've lost track of the target. Maybe another time.
Recover rebel vehicle
A rebel vehicle carrying hidden contraband broke down in %1, and the cops are sniffing around it. Get it to the marked safehouse nearby before %2 so we can recover the goods.
Safehouse
Good, you've brought the vehicle. Now keep our agent covered while he extracts the goods.
Leave the vehicle parked near the house or we can't work on it!
Keep the agent covered for %1 more seconds
Excellent, we've recovered the goods. You can keep the vehicle if you like. We've left some presents in it.
Transport rebel agent
A rebel agent in %1 needs an escort for important business. He'll make it worth our trouble if we help him. Pick him up before %2. Make sure you bring a vehicle.
Tell him to follow you
The rebel agent has joined your squad. Take him to his destination in %1.
We've picked up the rebel agent. Get him safely to his destination in %1 before %2.
Are you just driving me around in circles? I'm outta here.
Steal or Destroy Ammotruck
We've spotted an Ammotruck in an %1. Go there and destroy or steal it before %2.%2.
Ammo Truck Destroyed.
Ammo Truck Captured.
